task.title: Take Action
task.body:
Over the next few hours, do something you don’t usually do but may find satisfying (e.g., go into a store that has always seemed interesting; look on a website for something that interests you). 

* Notice how it feels to do what you feel compelled to do.

sharingWall.question: How did it feel to do something you felt compelled to do?

task.title: Take action
task.body: Over the next few hours, do something you don’t usually do but may find satisfying (e.g., go into a store that has always seemed interesting, but that you always pass by; or look on a website for something you wouldn’t normally buy) Notice how it felt to do what you felt compelled to do.

sharingWall.question: What was it like for you to do today’s quest?

followUp.title: Check-in
followUp.body: Time to check-in with today’s quest!

task.title: Age
task.body:
Nas próximas horas, faz algo que não costumas fazer, mas que aches gratificante (por exemplo, entrar numa loja que sempre te pareceu interessante; pesquisar algo num site que te interessa).

* Observa como te sentes ao fazer o que tens vontade de fazer.

sharingWall.question: Como te sentiste ao fazer o que tens vontade de fazer.?
